amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to give college campuses the opportunity to include all participants involved with the resolution process in training, which identifies and responds to crimes of domestic violence, dating violence, sexual assault, and stalking. The resolution process in training members include the Title IX coordinator's office as well as the office of student conduct.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Rouda.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
